name: 2022 6th International Conference on Structural and Civil Engineering
content: Publication: 1\. Submitted Papers to the conference will be subjected to the rigorous peer-review process. Accepted and registered papers will be published in the Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main academical databases. 2\. Selected papers of ICSCE 2022 will be recommended to be published in International Journal of Structural and Civil Engineering Research (IJSCER, ISSN: 2319-6009). Indexed by: Copernicus, New Jour, Open J-Gate, Research BIB (Japan), Indian Science, Google Scholar.(Quoted from official website).
